Base abstract mapper class that provides common pagination mapping functionality between external REST API DTOs and internal cursor-based pagination models.

## Key Components

- **`toRestPageInfo(CursorPageInfo)`** - Converts internal cursor page information to external REST API page info format
- **`toCursorPaginationCriteria(PaginationCriteria)`** - Transforms external pagination criteria to internal cursor pagination criteria
- **Abstract base class** - Designed to be extended by concrete REST mapper implementations

## Usage Example

```java
// Extend the base mapper for specific entity mapping
public class UserRestMapper extends BaseRestMapper {
    
    public UserPageResponse mapToRestResponse(UserCursorPage cursorPage) {
        return UserPageResponse.builder()
                .users(mapUsers(cursorPage.getContent()))
                .pageInfo(toRestPageInfo(cursorPage.getPageInfo()))
                .build();
    }
    
    public UserSearchRequest mapToInternalCriteria(UserRestSearchRequest request) {
        return UserSearchRequest.builder()
                .pagination(toCursorPaginationCriteria(request.getPagination()))
                .filters(mapFilters(request.getFilters()))
                .build();
    }
}
```

The mapper handles null-safe conversions and provides default empty criteria when pagination parameters are not provided, ensuring robust API integration between external and internal data models.
